prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon that emphasizes elegance and agility with a mix of red and white colors.
I want a fighting-type Pokemon that showcases a unique blend of traditional and modern design elements.
Generate a humanoid Pokemon with graceful features and a focus on mental prowess, using vibrant colors.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a martial artist, featuring striking colors and impressive agility.
Imagine a Pokemon that combines both psychic and fighting abilities, with dynamic movement and eye-catching colors.
Design a Pokemon with a mystical aura, showcasing its psychic powers through intricate designs and color patterns.
Show me a Pokemon that reflects a balance between physical strength and mental agility, featuring bold colors.

distinctive_features: Unique head shape with a distinctive hair-like structure
